review: This movie should've Indian Spy Touch but clearly it's show influence of Hollywood style. Saif Ali Khan did a great job of his role. After Langdha Tyagi in Omkara, Saif's role is much Appreciated for me. He had shown great dedication & hard work. Movie is also entertaining.

Agent Vinod - an action spy thriller film which has cool performance, high technical work and a perfect launch pad for spy genre in Indian films. It was pretty stylized & smart film than the 2012 released dumb commercial films of that year...
Get Some Popcorn Watch It and Have Fun Time....
Superb movie. Out and out a classic action thriller backed by excellent and flawless acting by leading stars. Should have been a blockbuster a must watch.
